T02D1526:83b-1: aa mri ta m'a ri ts'a n'a ma /
T02D1526:83b-3: bdud rtsi 'od zer can zhes bya ba /
T02D1526:83b-4: dpal bde mchog 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1526:83b-6: / rang gi gnas ni nyid du 'khyil //
T02D1526:83b-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste //
T02D1526:83b-8: 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas //
T02D1526:83b-9: yang dag pa ste rab tu bshad //
T02D1526:83b-10: yang dag pa yang rnam pa bzhi //
T02D1526:83b-11: de ni lus la rang bzhin gnas //
T02D1526:83b-12: 'di ltar shes pa'i lus nyid ni //
T02D1526:83b-13: bde ba chen po sku zhes bya //
T02D1526:83b-14: lte bar gsang ba drug cu bzhi //
T02D1526:83b-15: sprul pa'i yig 'bru dkar po dgod //
T02D1526:83b-16: a'a li k'a li g-yas dang g-yon //
T02D1526:83b-17: ye shes bzhi yi yi ge bsam //
T02D1526:83b-18: dbus kyi ri bong 'dzin par ro //
T02D1526:83b-19: sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhes su bshad //
T02D1526:83b-20: sems kyi gnas lugs chos sku'i brgyad//
T02D1526:83b-21: kha dog dkar po'i yi ge dgu //
T02D1526:83b-22: h'um bh'um tr'am hr'im kham yig rnams //
T02D1526:83b-23: dbus nas byang du rim bzhin dgod //
T02D1526:83b-24: mtshams su l'am m'am p'am t'am la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D1526:83b-25: mtshan ma med pa'i sku zhes bshad //
T02D1526:83b-26: longs spyod rdzogs sku bcu dang drug / mgrin pa'i gnas su yang dag skyes //
T02D1526:83b-27: de yi ri bong 'dzin par aam //
T02D1526:83b-28: aa wa ra la yi ge rnams //
T02D1526:83b-29: shar nas byang du rim bzhin no //
T02D1526:83b-30: rtog yul chu rlung gnyis kyis gnas //
T02D1526:83b-32: sa bon zla ba rgyas pa 'dra //
T02D1526:83b-33: bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'khyil //
T02D1526:83b-34: sum cu rtsa gnyis yang dag gnas //
T02D1526:83b-35: de yi gnas na a'a li gnyis //
T02D1526:83b-36: g-yas dang g-yon gnyis mgo dang mjug / gcig tu sprang pas brgyan pa yin //
T02D1526:83b-37: de dbus ham ste pra ma na //
T02D1526:83b-38: longs spyod gyen la bde chen thur //
T02D1526:83b-39: thabs dang shes rab tshul du gnas //
T02D1526:83b-40: chos dang sprul pa de bzhin no //
T02D1526:83b-41: kun gyi dbus na ri bong 'dzin//
T02D1526:84a-0: @84a * // 'khor lo yi ge kha dog dkar //
T02D1526:84a-1: yam las 'byung ba rlung gi dkyil //
T02D1526:84a-2: ha gnyis gnas su bsam par bya //
T02D1526:84a-3: de steng rang byung gru gsum bsam //
T02D1526:84a-4: rang gi gnas su bsam par bya //
T02D1526:84a-5: de ltar rang bzhin kun shes nas //
T02D1526:84a-6: ye shes chen po'i byin rlabs las //
T02D1526:84a-7: rlung gis me bus drug cu 'bar //
T02D1526:84a-8: de nyid ye shes zhes bya ba //
T02D1526:84a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te //
T02D1526:84a-10: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs nas //
T02D1526:84a-11: ham las bdud rtsi zla rgyun 'bab //
T02D1526:84a-12: kun gyi lus bsregs mgor phyin bsam //
T02D1526:84a-13: longs spyod gsum bskor 'byung bzhi bsregs //
T02D1526:84a-14: de nas g-yas phyung sangs rgyas nas //
T02D1526:84a-15: sems can kun bsregs dbu ma g-yon //
T02D1526:84a-16: thim ste bde chen g-yon nas bskor //
T02D1526:84a-17: bsregs pas rna ba g-yas su 'du //
T02D1526:84a-18: mkha' 'gro ma kun sems gcig byed //
T02D1526:84a-19: aa ba dh'u t'i'i gnas nas byung //
T02D1526:84a-20: sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med bsregs //
T02D1526:84a-21: steng gi zhal du pra ma na //
T02D1526:84a-22: bde ba chen po'i lus kyang skyes //
T02D1526:84a-23: ham dkar las byung sa bon dkar //
T02D1526:84a-24: lus gnas mi gnas ye shes skyes //
T02D1526:84a-25: de ru ma nus chu yi rtsa //
T02D1526:84a-26: g-yon gyi sar 'du sprul pa ste //
T02D1526:84a-27: der ni yang dag rab tu bzung //
T02D1526:84a-28: de ru mi gnas sambhoga / rtsa yi rdo rje'i lam nas 'gro //
T02D1526:84a-29: sambho ga nas chos sku yi //
T02D1526:84a-30: lus rnams yang dag skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1526:84a-31: skyes nas bskal ba'i bar du gnas //
T02D1526:84a-32: chos kyi gnas su ma skyes na //
T02D1526:84a-33: ni rma k'a ya'i bar du gnas //
T02D1526:84a-34: yang nas yang du 'di bzhin bya //
T02D1526:84a-35: rnam rtog med pa'i rnal 'byor bya //
T02D1526:84a-36: yar gyis bsreg cing mar gyis gso //
T02D1526:84a-38: rtag tu 'di la blta bar bya'o //
T02D1526:84a-39: nam zhig de la brtan gyur na //
T02D1526:84a-40: mtshan ma lnga'am yang na g-yo //
T02D1526:84a-41: 'bar zhing g-yo na yig mgo bcad //
T02D1526:84a-42: bcad pa'i bzhi po yang dag bzhu //
T02D1526:84a-43: rtsa yig rdo rje'i lam nas ni //
T02D1526:84a-46: bde ba chen po'i sku zhes bya //
T02D1526:84a-47: gzhan gyi don sogs yon tan rnams //
T02D1526:84a-49: bla na med pa'i dgongs rgyud ni //
T02D1526:84a-50: dpal gyi zhabs kyis bdag la bstan //
T02D1526:84b-1: bde ba chen por rab tu bshad //
T02D1526:84b-2: sbyor ba'i lus ni thams cad las //
T02D1526:84b-3: rgyal ba rnams kyis spras par bshad //
T02D1526:84b-4: shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas pa'i //
T02D1526:84b-5: snod ldan bdag nyid chen pos bzung //
T02D1526:84b-6: lus sems bde bar spyad nas ni //
T02D1526:84b-7: nyin mtshan sbyor ba bsten par bya //
T02D1526:84b-8: bdag gis brtsams yin bdud rtsi 'di //
T02D1526:84b-9: 'di ltar khams gsum kun kyang de //
T02D1526:84b-10: shi dang 'dra bar mtshungs pas na //
T02D1526:84b-11: yang dag bde bas 'tsho bar shog / rtsa dang
T02D1526:84b-12: rlung gi de kho na'i rnal 'byor dra ba'i 'khor
T02D1526:84b-13: lo bdud rtsi 'od zer bde ba chen pos tshim
T02D1526:84b-14: byed rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po ratna shri
T02D1526:84b-15: dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas gtan la phab pa /
